startscreen.welcome1: Ring of Fire ist ein lustiges Trinkspiel.
startscreen.welcome3: Genieße das Spiel und viel Spaß.

card.action.description2: Everyone has to start drinking at the same time. As soon as player 1 stops drinking, player 2 may stop drinking. Player 3 may stop as soon as player 2 stops drinking, and so on.
card.action.description5: Come up with a category (e.g. Colors). Each player must enumerate one item from the category.
card.action.description6: Player 1 makes a dance move. Player 2 repeats the dance move and adds a second one.
card.action.description8: Put your hands up! The last player drinks!
card.action.description9: Pick a mate. Your mate must always drink when you drink and the other way around.
card.action.description10: You are the thumb master until the next 4 is picked. Put your thumb on a surface. Everyone must copy you. The last person to do so drinks.
card.action.description12: You are now the question master until the next Queen is picked. If you ask someone a question and they answer, they have to drink.
card.action.description13: Say something you never did. Everyone who did it has to drink.
card.action.description14: Make a rule. Everyone needs to drink when he breaks the rule.
